summary: Puts my Snow Leopard Forsworn armors (all versions) in game without replacing the forsworn armor texture for all other NPCs - UPDATE: No longer disappears on reloading a save. Can be enchanted/improved. Can be purchased.
descriptionHtml:
Snow Leopard Forsworn (Non-Replacer Version) v14 by Rekicker

[b][size=3][color=Yellow]UPDATE: Can be purchased at the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun (with the v14 ESP update)![/size][/b][/color]
[color=lightgreen] Please also make a note of the changed \"player.additem\" codes below![/color]

[color=Darkorange][b]First of all, please comment. Honestly, I couldn\'t care less about endorsements (that\'s not true at all, they are very nice), but my engine runs on feedback. If I run out of fuel, I\'ll look elsewhere for my much-needed personal validation. Spank you very much.[/b][/color]

INSTALL
1. Drop everything in the Data folder into your Data folder.

2. Make sure you check the SnowLeopardForsworn.esp to be loaded.

3. Buy the items. They are now available at the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun due to a generous but anonymous contributor.

-OR-

4. Use the console to gain the items:

The \"XX\" may be 00, 01, 02, 03, etc. Just keep trying, don\'t give up! Or do give up. It\'s easier.

\"player.additem XXdead01 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn Cuirass (Skimpy but Covered)
\"player.additem XXdead02 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn Gauntlets
\"player.additem XXdead03 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn Boots
\"player.additem XXdead04 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn Topless (Loincloth Only)
\"player.additem XXdead05 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn No Panties (Drafty)
\"player.additem XXdead06 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn No Bra and No Undies (Bouncy and Drafty)
\"player.additem XXdead07 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn Undies but No Bra (Bouncy)

5. Please note that every version of the armor is exactly the same for males. Sorry bro, I just don\'t care about dudes so much.

6. Enchantments have been removed. No more enchantments. If you want enchantments, do them yourself. You can you know.

7. All items can be improved at a workbench. Takes a bit of leather to upgrade. Totally worth it. Smash a rabbit, staple the hide to your bottom. Win-time.

8. Enjoy.


UNINSTALL
1. Delete \'Data/SnowLeopardForsworn.esp\', the \'Data/textures/armor/slforsworn\' folder, and the \'Data/meshes/clothes/slforsworn\' folder.
2. Stop enjoying.
(Game saves that previously had the SnowLeopardForsworn.esp checked will warn you that resources are missing once you uninstall but this warning can be ignored. I think. Who knows? MUAHAHAHAHAAH!).

PRE-ANSWERED QUESTIONS
How did you get stand-alone armor into the game without the creation kit? It was... interesting. And a little complicated. If there\'s enough demand, maybe I\'ll write up a tutorial.

Want to mod this mod or upload this mod elsewhere or tear this mod to pieces and make it your own? Go ahead.

Want to give me credit? Thanks.

Don\'t want to give me credit? Oh well. I hope you get a pimple on your bum. Several, actually.
author: Rekicker
